attributes.action: Have fruit trees & bushes etc in parks. Healthy snacks available to all.
attributes.additional_details:
Have fruit trees & bushes etc planted in parks. Healthy fruit /veg snacks available to all, no waste, just pick as & when needed. 
In children's play parks, next to excersice equipment, people should have organic, non gmo fruit and veg grown in all public parks, available to eat. Promoting good health & ending hunger. No one should go hungry & we should all have access to fresh fruit & veg to stay healthy.
attributes.background: Have fruit trees & bushes etc planted in parks. Healthy snacks available to all, no waste, just pick as & when needed.

rejection.details:
Decisions about planting and the provision of fruit in local parks is a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to create a fund for local authorities to access to plant fruit trees and bushes in local parks, if that's something you would like to happen.
